subject: [R] Transfer entropy not implemented in R?
body:
Hi,

I couldn't find the 'transfer entropy' implemented in any R packages. I can't follow the math needed here (www.macalester.edu/~kaplan/knoxville/PRL00461.pdf). If it is not implemented, could somebody do it? Or write a "garage level code" for testing purposes?

Atte Tenkanen

______________________________________________
R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
